>>Send me some info on The installation of JUnit

ud, 

what kind of problems are you facing?  Some of the basic problems 
that seem to occur are related to the classpath variable.  If your 
creating your own tests then it could be inside your code, but I'd 
suggest trying the sample tests that JUnit provides.

--J
